extendedInfo.description: Note Pad (also known as Notes List or Notes) is another sample of an Android application from Google with very basic functionality. It features a simple text processor and lists all notes in a linear structure. Users can only add, edit and delete notes.Note Pad comes from Android SDK, all copyrights belong to Google Inc.

reviews.comment: Really good egen you\'re buying good etc works fine, no problem at all on my hero. Love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect ....
reviews.comment: .... nothing fancy, simply allows you to make quick notes. I use it to keep a list of info that I use regulary so that I can quickly copy and paste it into forms and documents. Why Smart Phones don\'t come with a form of note pad as standard is beyond me.
reviews.author: Mark Lawrence

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app if you need to write notes to remember. I wouldn\'t remember anything if it wasn\'t for this app. Great! It\'s a must download. Awesome app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Deletes notes
reviews.comment: Not recommended, will delete whatever you have written if you let your screen timeout or if your note gets interrupted by a call, text, etc...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its simple and great but i wish you made it so we have to press a save button. Because somtimes it doesnt save if i dont press the back button
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If u have a black screen open menu to start notepad. but can\'t save my notes and open new notepad. I rather use a text message n save as \"draft\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think its great for just ideas to write dowan but i think you should update by being able to print and word count. This would make 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: no problems wit it. perfect to write all my rhymes, does what its supposed to. follow me on twitter @_mycloud_
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Horrible. There way too many bugs in it to even list. I wrote the same note 3 times before it finally saved
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sucks...it didnt even open for me. All i saw was a black screen -.-. Lg ally
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Average, download evernote instead. It\'s free and it lets you save pictures with notes, plain notes, audio, etc and tag them. Notepad is a joke
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Failed to launch on HTC desire. Just get a black screen. From the other lack-lustre reviews I can only award 1/5 for use on a Desire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A good application for what it is, but fairly simple. Would like to see more options like photos and syncing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this android app i probably use this one the most i will typicaly use this 2 or 3 times a day it help make a grocery list or a to do list
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: To the people who say its a black screen press menu and the add note and then you can type
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it because i need to save my book list but it make me mad when it deletes after it sleeps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this program. I save a ton of text here and shopping lists. Very simple and to the point program
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not easy to use, and loses notes if you dont remember to hit the back button...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple is best
reviews.comment: Great app, sometimes simple is better and quicker. Does the job I want it for, thanks to Dev team.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Terrible, I was busy making a note and my kid needed me came back to my phone to find all my notes were gone.
reviews.author: A Google User
